item.title: Project 3 Blog Post
item.description: library(reticulate) py_config() ## python: /stor/home/cf25685/.local/share/r-miniconda/envs/r-reticulate/bin/python ## libpython: /stor/home/cf25685/.local/share/r-miniconda/envs/r-reticulate/lib/libpython3.6m.so ## pythonhome: /stor/home/cf25685/.local/share/r-miniconda/envs/r-reticulate:/stor/home/cf25685/.local/share/r-miniconda/envs/r-reticulate ## version: 3.6.13 | packaged by conda-forge | (default, Feb 19 2021, 05:36:01) [GCC 9.3.0] ## numpy: /stor/home/cf25685/.local/share/r-miniconda/envs/r-reticulate/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy ## numpy_version: 1.19.5 py_install("pandas") py_install("numpy") py_install("matplotlib") age_in_years = 30 type(age_in_years) ## <class 'int'> print("hello world") ## hello world print("This is a picture of an artery!") ## This is a picture of an artery!
